LanguageData.PlantWaterTallGrass.label: tall water grass
LanguageData.PlantWaterTallGrass.description: Wild tall grass. Significantly slows down anyone moving over it.
LanguageData.VG_Cattail.label: Cattail
LanguageData.VG_Cattail.description: Wild tall plant with a unique flowering spike, flat blade like leaves. Grows in shallow waters.
